let array = [1,5,2,3,4,2,3,1,3,4]

function unique(array){
    let hash = []
    for(let i=0;i<array.length; i++){
        hash[array[i]] = true
    }
    let result = []
    for(let key in hash){
        result.push(key)
    }
    return result
}

let array = [1,5,2,3,4,2,3,1,3,4]

function unique(array){
  let map = new Map();
  let result = []
  for (let i = 0; i < array.length; i++) {
    if(map.has(array[i])) { // åˆ¤æ–­ map ä¸­æ˜¯å¦å·²æœ‰è¯¥ key 
      continue
    } else {  // å¦‚æœ map ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰è¯¥ keyï¼Œå°±åŠ å…¥ result ä¸­
      map.set(array[i], true);  
      result.push(array[i]);
    }
  } 
  return result;
}

//ç¡®å®šæœ€å°æ•°ä¸‹æ ‡
let minFlag = (strings) => {
    let flag = 0;
    for (let i = 0; i < strings.length; i++) {
        if (strings[i] < strings[flag]) {
            flag = i;
        } 
    }  return flag
};
//äº¤æ¢ä¸¤æ•°ä½ç½®
let swap = (array, i, j) => {
    let temp = array[i];
    array[i] = array[j];
    array[j] = temp;
};
//
function sort(array) {
    for (let i = 0; i < array.length - 1; i++) {
        //é€šè¿‡sliceåˆ‡ç‰‡ä¸æ”¹å˜åŸæ•°ç»„çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œç¡®å®šæœ€å°å€¼ä¸‹æ ‡ï¼Œäº¤æ¢è‡³é¦–ä½
        //ç„¶åâ€œåˆ‡é™¤â€é¦–ä½ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œä¸‹è½®æœ€å°ç­›é€‰ï¼Œæ¨é€è‡³æ¬¡ä½ï¼Œç›´è‡³æ’åºå®Œæˆ
        let index = minFlag(array.slice(i)) + i ; 
        if (index !== i) {
            swap(array, index, i );
        }
    }
    return array;
}
